title: Pea Ridge National Military Park: Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Traveling Trunks     Reservations                  Traveling Trunk Reservations       Call to make a reservation today!  Reservations are for two week periods and they are free to rent.  You must pick them up and drop them off at the Visitor Center in person.  We cannot/will not deliver.  The person who signs it out is responsible for all items.  Call (479) 451-8122 to reserve a trunk, or by email at virginia_dyer@nps.gov.    Â    2015 February 16-3/05 - Confederate Trunk 27-3/13 - Union Trunk March April
